Question & Options:
Which films were distributed by Universal Pictures and are part of the Fifty Shades series?
Options:
A. A) Fifty Shades of Grey
B. B) Fifty Shades Darker
C. C) Fifty Shades Freed
D. D) All of the above

Which statements are true regarding the relationship between 'Fifty Shades of Grey', 'Universal Pictures', and 'Fifty Shades Darker'?
Options:
A. A) Universal Pictures distributed both 'Fifty Shades of Grey' and 'Fifty Shades Darker'.
B. B) 'Fifty Shades Darker' is a sequel to 'Fifty Shades of Grey'.
C. C) The script for 'Fifty Shades Darker' was confirmed before its release.
D. D) 'Fifty Shades Darker' was released in 2016.
Correct Answer: A) Universal Pictures distributed both 'Fifty Shades of Grey' and 'Fifty Shades Darker'., B) 'Fifty Shades Darker' is a sequel to 'Fifty Shades of Grey'., C) The script for 'Fifty Shades Darker' was confirmed before its release., D) 'Fifty Shades Darker' was released in 2016.
